name: Maryam 🌟
greetingText: I cherish our friendship, it always brings a smile to my face 😊
wishText: May your life be filled with joy, laughter, and wonderful moments 🌟✨
text1: I’m thinking of you right now, my amazing friend! 😄💭
textInChatBox: I’m sending you all my good vibes today 🌸💌
text2: I was planning to tell you something... 🤔💫
text3: But I paused for a moment... 🕒💭
text4: I realised I wanted to say something 💬
text5Content: You are such a great friend 🌟🤗
outroText: Okay, now come back and let me know if you felt the friendship vibes 💌
replayText: Or click, if you want to see my friendship again 👯‍♀️
